content: Session 2 investigation reveals P1 is not 80% complete as expected, but only about 15% complete. 154 print statements remain across 6 files. metacognitive_cascade.py alone has 116 print statements. Strategic decision: focus on smaller files first (reflex_logger, investigation_strategy, session_json_handler) for quick wins, then medium files (investigation_plugin, session_database). Consider leaving metacognitive_cascade.py for future session due to size.

Session 2 Progress Check: Completed 14 print statement replacements across 3 files (reflex_logger: 1, investigation_strategy: 3, session_json_handler: 10). 140 print statements remain. Files completed: 3/6. Strategic focus working well - quick wins from smaller files. Next: investigation_plugin.py (11 prints) or session_database.py (13 prints) before tackling the large metacognitive_cascade.py (116 prints).

Crash recovery analysis complete. Session 4 actually completed successfully - they finished Section 1 of metacognitive_cascade.py (18 prints refactored) and created comprehensive checkpoint. Total P1 progress: 42/140 prints (30%). Ready for Session 5 to tackle Section 2.
